forum.content:
hi~Lair how have been you?

I guess...you gave up something,right?

And then...why did you think you couldn't smile again?why did you fake you never believed love already?

No...you just too tire to trust yourself.who are you?A loved fool!please take this belief which is how to love.please face love again.

shall we?Lair...
forum.title: giving a reason for myself
